title: Little Alchemy 2: How to Make Small + All Recipes

steps.title: Combine Philosophy + Bacteria to create Small.
steps.content: Combine Philosophy + Bacteria to create Small. You can combine a series of elements to make Small with and without the Time element in Little Alchemy 2 . [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to make Small: With Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Planet + Fire = Sun Fire + Fire = Energy Sun + Energy = Solar cell Solar cell + Sun = Electricity Glass + Electricity = Light bulb Human + Light bulb = Idea Human + Idea = Philosophy Life + Mud = Bacteria Philosophy + Bacteria = Small Without Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Planet + Fire = Sun Sun + Energy = Solar cell Solar cell + Sun = Electricity Glass + Electricity = Light bulb Human + Light bulb = Idea Human + Idea = Philosophy Life + Mud = Bacteria Philosophy + Bacteria = Small If you want to make Big, you can combine Philosophy + Planet.

steps.title: Small can be used to create other mid-game elements.
steps.content: Small can be used to create other mid-game elements.
